pr_title: GEODE-8517: GatewaySenderEventImpl's 2 new attributes were introduced…

timeline.message: GEODE-8517: GatewaySenderEventImpl's 2 new attributes were introduced in 1.14 not 1.13

timeline.author: pivotal-eshu

replies.bodyText: The version in toData() is 0. So it will not help. I added "if (version == 0 || version >= KnownVersion.GEODE_1_14_0.ordinal()) {" too. The result is the same. It did not improve on reproducing 49196.
replies.author: gesterzhou

replies.bodyText: There is no need for condition check here. The appropriate version of toData() is invoked by  DSFIDSerializerImpl.invokeToData() and InternalDataSerializer.invokeToData(). Similarly, there is no need from condition check in fromData().
replies.author: jchen21

timeline.message:
Revert "Remove unnecessary IF condition check."

This reverts commit 61980f8d95b8dfed2dd23a4540b22893e936f57c.
